 2021-10302021-12-17,  ,  NA,  ,  , 
ActCanada Petroleum Resources Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Order Prohibiting Certain Activities in Arctic Offshore Waters
PrecisOrder amending the ORDER PROHIBITING CERTAIN ACTIVITIES IN ARCTIC OFFSHORE WATERS in order to (1) continue to prohibit any person or oil and gas licence holder from beginning or continuing any work or activity in Canadaâ€™s Arctic waters and preserve the rights of active oil and gas licence holders; and (2) freeze 11 active exploration licences in the Arctic offshore, preventing the licence holders from carrying out work and preserving the terms of their licences. The Order will expire on December 31, 2022.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0272 Publication Date: 2022-01-05
AttachmentsAttachment
